title: CRUX Asset Management - European Specialist Situations Fund
body:
# Crux Asset Management _European Specialist Situations Fund_

## The Task

Having created CRUXâ€™s brand identity and launched them into the market with a corporate advertising campaign, they asked us to develop a B to C campaign sharing the strong performance of their European Special Situation Fund.

## The Solution

We developed a campaign using close up shots of classic performance cars, creating the analogy between these beautifully constructed high performance machines and their funds.

## The Results

The campaign has taken the fund from an average position of 43/108 funds in their sector, in terms of net sales, to 2/107 - and quickly too.
